author: Mike
content:
A bit tough on Alessandro, as a sailor dedicated to preserving marine ecology and educating young people by taking them sailing, at his own expense. Being bitten by something you love must be tough. He doesn’t make any judgemental comments on the Orca’s behaviour, which is notable.
Do they do this for fun? Is it revenge for hurting their world? Only they know, and they ain’t telling.
I have had pods of pilot whales swimming close alongside our catamaran off south west England and we have bowled along at 12 knots together in a most amicable fashion, eye to eye. Curiosity certainly, but not a hint of threat.

content: There have also been reports of attack off Shetland.
